meta.title: Jamshaid Ahmed | web developer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing product design work and skills

about.bio: I craft user-focused web applications that solve real-world problems. With over 5 years of experience in front-end development and UX research, I'm passionate about building accessible, responsive, and ethically designed digital experiences.
focus: Building intuitive and accessible web applications
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions
Integrating user feedback and research into front-end development

experience.title: Front-End Development
experience.description: Contributed to the development of key product features in a collaborative team environment. Helped implement a component-based design system using React, which improved design consistency and reduced front-end development time. Supported user research and testing to inform UI improvements and enhance user experience.
achievements: Collaborated on rebuilding the main dashboard in React, improving load time and boosting user engagement by 35%
Contributed to front-end development for 3 feature rollouts, helping increase user retention by 25%
Assisted in establishing a reusable component library, enhancing consistency and speeding up the development process

experience.title: back-End Development
experience.description: Worked closely with cross-functional teams to build and maintain robust backend services for web and mobile applications. Developed RESTful APIs, integrated databases, and contributed to improving system performance and scalability.
achievements: Developed and maintained backend APIs for 10+ client projects in fintech, healthcare, and e-commerce sectors
Optimized database queries and backend logic, improving application performance and reducing response time by up to 30%
Contributed to API documentation and improved integration workflows for frontend teams

experience.title: GitHub For version Control
experience.description: Utilized GitHub for version control and collaboration on design projects. Managed repositories, conducted code reviews, and facilitated team workflows.
achievements: Managed version control for 10+ design projects, ensuring smooth collaboration and code integrity
Conducted code reviews and provided feedback to improve code quality and maintainability
Implemented GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment workflows
